timeline.message: Fail all queued documents on 401 or 403 (will repeat until done)

timeline.bodyText: If we want to we could exit, but I'm not sure it's always the best thing to do since there could be a fix to the problem rolling out simultaneously, we could be feeding to multiple clusters etc. I think in general this client wants to keep trying until timeout, for better or worse.
timeline.author: bratseth
